blog.name: alt3rluv

blog.description: My skam universe blog; currently watching all skam remakes as they are airing.

summary: i don’t get the chat thing, is this their passive aggressive way to ask everyone to meet without specifically inviting imane so...
body:
i don’t get the chat thing, is this their passive aggressive way to ask everyone to meet without specifically inviting imane so if she shows up on her own or not its on her? i don’t get it


or is supposed to say they ignored her apology and are just making plans??


i mean either way it doesn’t look good????? am i supposed to be cheering this friendship on??? what the hell is happening,


IT’S JUST SO DAMN RUDE?? YALL GHOSTING HER IN THE GROUP CHAT? WHAT?

If not stated otherwise, this is not a rec tumblr. ALT ER LOVE

summary: I know there's a better way for me to say it
title: I know there's a better way for me to say it
description:
by cmc

Lucas attempts to survive the bac and his father’s wedding. Eliott’s just trying to figure out how to become a person.

Words: 28394, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: SKAM (France)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Lucas Lallemant, Eliott Demaury
  • Relationships: Eliott Demaury/Lucas Lallemant, Minor or Background Relationship(s), Emma Borges/Manon Demissy, Sofiane Alaoui/Imane Bakhellal
  • Additional Tags: Bipolar Disorder, Established Relationship, also daphné is a lesbian, pretty much everyone makes an appearance at some point, Fluff and Angst, im gonna be honest not a lot happens in this, it’s like 28k of supportive bfs and that’s it

blog.name: inthedreamatorium

tags: i'm sorry anon you had no idea what you unleashed when you messaged me
this clip is seriously the best
keri's skam france ted talk series
summary: You mentioned vendredi 19h34. I forgot what scene it is (shame on me) and this clip has 336k views?? 😦😧 i know people are...
question: You mentioned vendredi 19h34. I forgot what scene it is (shame on me) and this clip has 336k views?? 😦😧 i know people are watching whole episode but this is devastating! Smh
answer:
Right?

RIGHT?

It absolutely confounds me that the fandom doesn’t love and appreciate this clip more. This was the first clip that showed us just how different Lucas’ season was going to be from the original. It allowed us a rare glimpse into Eliott’s point of view. We saw the moment he fell in love. We saw why he fell in love. It’s what sold me on this season and what made me realize I was watching something truly special.

What more could you possibly want from this clip? It literally has everything but a kiss and you know what? Sometimes sexual tension is even better than a kiss because it’s a sign of things to come.

Let’s break this down with screenshots shall we?

We have this look from Lucas, right at the beginning. He is so happily content to be sitting on the couch with Eliott. Not carrying in the slightest that he’s pissed off his friends and his sorta maybe girlfriend. Nothing outside that room is bothering him.

He’s had only two interactions with Eliott before this and he’s already THIS at ease with him?

And then you have fun flirty Lucas. Who teases Eliott when he says he doesn’t want to get up off the couch because A) he’s lazy and B) he’s stoned. But what Lucas doesn’t know (and what we and Eliott know) is that it’s C) Eliott just wants an excuse to look at his butt. And you know, we get it.

(let’s take a moment to say RIP to the vinyl that Lucas mishandles and scratches and totally wrecked. Though in hindsight, knowing how petty Lucas is he probs purposefully accidentally ruined it because as much as he thinks Eliott is cute, no one should listen to dubstep on vinyl)

This is so long oh god I’m sorry.

He then makes the decision to play with the piano. Up to this point, we have had zero indication that Lucas is musical. If anything, the way he treats the vinyl shows us that he really doesn’t know a thing about music.

(I’m so curious about the sheet music. What song is it? Who does it belong to? Why don’t we know more about Eliott’s apartment? Does he live alone? Are his parents around? Who plays the piano if not Eliott? Is the piano and sheet music for aesthetic reasons only because if so, you’re such a hipster Eliott)

(*cough* give Eliott his own season *cough*)

I just love Lucas at this moment here. He knows he’s going to play something for Eliott and he knows what song he’s going to play and I like to think that him hesitatingly hitting the notes, acting like he doesn’t know how to play, is a way to hype himself up because he’s nervous.

But then Eliott mentions the triangle and we get this beautiful exchange.

Eliott, without realizing it, broke through Lucas’ nervous tension and gave him the courage to play.

(have we seen Eliott smile like this yet? Like, his eyes all squinty and genuine and blissfully happy? I don’t think we have and so here’s another reason why this clip is the best)

Also…why does Eliott have a triangle? I have questions.

(*cough* give Eliott his own season *cough*)

And then…Lucas starts playing and we shift to Eliott’s point of view.

And Eliott is?

Well.

He’s this.

He is, as the kids say, shook.

And we’re shook right alongside him because we’ve known Lucas for two seasons and have been in his world for nearly two weeks and we had zero idea he had this in him.

He’s playing with his back to Eliott. He can’t see the look on Eliott’s face. He can’t see the moment that Eliot fell in love with him. He can’t see the moment the world righted itself for Eliott.

But we can.

Lucas turns around to look at Eliott and Eliott is just enamored? And it emboldens Lucas to keep going? And not only keep going but shift keys and play even more intricately?

Wow.

The moment ends and Lucas turns back around and Eliott is still looking at him like this.

I swear to god this is a different screenshot then the ones above. It’s the look he has right when Lucas turns around, right before he shakes himself out of it. It’s unbelievable. Eliott’s journey during this very brief moment is unbelievable.

He says Lucas is surprising?

And that he likes people who surprise him?

While looking at Lucas like this?

And Lucas looking back like this?

(these two screenshots are a second apart. ONE SECOND. They are so gone for each other these poor souls have no idea)

They’re sharing this intense moment and I’m pretty sure both their hearts and time and space and everything stopped for them.

Alas, the moment breaks and Elliott has to leave and he looks so unbelievably pained at the idea of leaving Lucas because things took a huge turn for him and he needs to spend more time with him. He needs to feel again. He hasn’t felt like that in so long.

But this is only episode 2 so Lucas has to leave and we have this odd moment of Eliott playing with Lucas’ hair.

And the look on Lucas’ face after Eliott shuts the door is a quick one but it’s a good one.

(the first time they touched!)

It’s so random but then we find out from Niels it was because Eliott wanted to kiss Lucas? And this was his way of stopping himself? And it’s the moment he knew Lucas was his hedgehog?

Those behind-the-scenes moments that Niels and David shared were truly such a gift because it gave us even more insight into Eliott and allowed us more room to connect and understand him, and it made us root for him even more because of it.

(I curse those who made them stop sharing)

Lucas looks so shell shocked when he walks out of Eliott’s apartment. I don’t think any of us can really blame him. Something magical had happened and he’s not quite sure what it means but he wants to and he wants to live in that magical moment for always.

But he sees the texts from his friends and his kinda maybe girlfriend.

And he looks over and sees Eliott kissing Lucille.

And then his face is all angsty.

Then the clip ends.

It’s really not fair but it’s only the beginning. He doesn’t know it. Maybe Eliott doesn’t either. But we do because of this clip.

He is, as the kids say, shook.

And we’re shook right alongside him because we’ve known Lucas for two seasons and have been in his world for nearly two weeks and we had zero idea he had this in him.

He’s playing with his back to Eliott. He can’t see the look on Eliott’s face. He can’t see the moment that Eliot fell in love with him. He can’t see the moment the world righted itself for Eliott.

But we can.

Lucas turns around to look at Eliott and Eliott is just enamored? And it emboldens Lucas to keep going? And not only keep going but shift keys and play even more intricately?

Wow.

The moment ends and Lucas turns back around and Eliott is still looking at him like this.

I swear to god this is a different screenshot then the ones above. It’s the look he has right when Lucas turns around, right before he shakes himself out of it. It’s unbelievable. Eliott’s journey during this very brief moment is unbelievable.

He says Lucas is surprising?

And that he likes people who surprise him?

While looking at Lucas like this?

And Lucas looking back like this?

(these two screenshots are a second apart. ONE SECOND. They are so gone for each other these poor souls have no idea)

They’re sharing this intense moment and I’m pretty sure both their hearts and time and space and everything stopped for them.

Alas, the moment breaks and Elliott has to leave and he looks so unbelievably pained at the idea of leaving Lucas because things took a huge turn for him and he needs to spend more time with him. He needs to feel again. He hasn’t felt like that in so long.

But this is only episode 2 so Lucas has to leave and we have this odd moment of Eliott playing with Lucas’ hair.

And the look on Lucas’ face after Eliott shuts the door is a quick one but it’s a good one.

(the first time they touched!)

It’s so random but then we find out from Niels it was because Eliott wanted to kiss Lucas? And this was his way of stopping himself? And it’s the moment he knew Lucas was his hedgehog?

Those behind-the-scenes moments that Niels and David shared were truly such a gift because it gave us even more insight into Eliott and allowed us more room to connect and understand him, and it made us root for him even more because of it.

(I curse those who made them stop sharing)

Lucas looks so shell shocked when he walks out of Eliott’s apartment. I don’t think any of us can really blame him. Something magical had happened and he’s not quite sure what it means but he wants to and he wants to live in that magical moment for always.

But he sees the texts from his friends and his kinda maybe girlfriend.

And he looks over and sees Eliott kissing Lucille.

And then his face is all angsty.

Then the clip ends.

It’s really not fair but it’s only the beginning. He doesn’t know it. Maybe Eliott doesn’t either. But we do because of this clip.
trail.content_abstract:
Right?

RIGHT?

It absolutely confounds me that the fandom doesn’t love and appreciate this clip more. This was the first clip that showed us just how different Lucas’ season was going to be from the original. It allowed us a rare glimpse into Eliott’s point of view. We saw the moment he fell in love. We saw why he fell in love. It’s what sold me on this season and what made me realize I was watching something truly special.

What more could you possibly want from this clip? It literally has everything but a kiss and you know what? Sometimes sexual tension is even better than a kiss because it’s a sign of things to come.

Let’s break this down with screenshots shall we?

We have this look from Lucas, right at the beginning. He is so happily content to be sitting on the couch with Eliott. Not carrying in the slightest that he’s pissed off his friends and his sorta maybe girlfriend. Nothing outside that room is bothering him.

He’s had only two interactions with Eliott before this and he’s already THIS at ease with him?

And then you have fun flirty Lucas. Who teases Eliott when he says he doesn’t want to get up off the couch because A) he’s lazy and B) he’s stoned. But what Lucas doesn’t know (and what we and Eliott know) is that it’s C) Eliott just wants an excuse to look at his butt. And you know, we get it.

(let’s take a moment to say RIP to the vinyl that Lucas mishandles and scratches and totally wrecked. Though in hindsight, knowing how petty Lucas is he probs purposefully accidentally ruined it because as much as he thinks Eliott is cute, no one should listen to dubstep on vinyl)

This is so long oh god I’m sorry.
